about_the_game:
IO Interloper is a hacking heist game all about peering through security cameras, piloting drones, duping rubes, and saying I'M IN in a really gruff voice.

In the tech-bloated future of 2035, an anonymous hacker attempts to steal the fortune of the “richest,” “most passionate,” “most go-getter-est” CEO the world has ever seen. A simple heist rapidly becomes an investigation into the seemingly metaphysical secrets of the biggest company in history.



Learn about your target, use their devices against them, and make a clean getaway. You just gotta choose to lock in.

In the tech-bloated future of 2035, an anonymous hacker attempts to steal the fortune of the “richest,” “most passionate,” “most go-getter-est” CEO the world has ever seen. A simple heist rapidly becomes an investigation into the seemingly metaphysical secrets of the biggest company in history.



Learn about your target, use their devices against them, and make a clean getaway. You just gotta choose to lock in.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or higher 64 bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 780
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game is still in development; system requirements are estimates and may change before release.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.11 or higher 64 bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 780
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game is still in development; system requirements are estimates and may change before release.
